definition: again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: And drinking largely sobers us again.
sentences.chinese: 豪飲則便使人再度清醒。

sentences.english: I look forward to the day when the world economy returns to good health.
sentences.chinese: 我期待着，世界經濟終將柳暗花明，再度繁榮。

sentences.english: That's why you should never consider it beneath you to revisit the moneymaking basics.
sentences.chinese: 因此你決不能忽視對盈利基本要素的再度審視。

sentences.english: When a proton recaptures an electron, red light is frequently emitted.
sentences.chinese: 當一個質子再度捕捉到電子時，常常會輻射出紅光。

sentences.english: But Tobey again stroke, good times don't last long, no chance of recovery.
sentences.chinese: 但好景不長，託比再度中風，再無康復的可能了。

sentences.english: Many years were to pass before we met up again.
sentences.chinese: 過了許多年本人們纔再度邂逅。

sentences.english: Once again, opportunistic Imperial warlords pounced .
sentences.chinese: 善於投機的帝國軍閥再度崛起。

sentences.english: After the lining which processes once again could be out of the ordinary, unique.
sentences.chinese: 顛末再度處置地面料將會是不同凡響，無獨有偶地。

sentences.english: But I don't think my wife and daughter will go with me any more.
sentences.chinese: 但我不認爲我的太太和女兒會再度與我同往。

sentences.english: Once again, Beijing may have overplayed its hand.
sentences.chinese: 中國當局有可能再度高估了自己的上風。

sentences.english: Can the world really afford another risk of this magnitude?
sentences.chinese: 世界難道真能再度承受這麼大風險嗎？

sentences.english: Individual mountain gorillas have never been re-introduced to the wild successfully.
sentences.chinese: 獨個的山地大猩猩從來不能再度在野外成功存活。

sentences.english: The dwarf's heart grew strong when he heard Finola's name.
sentences.chinese: 聽到菲諾拉的名字，侏儒的心又再度堅強起來。

sentences.english: I must down to the seas again, to the vagrant gypsy life.
sentences.chinese: 我必須再度出航，前往吉普賽式的漂盪。

sentences.english: SI Latino: Can Argentina win the Copa América again?
sentences.chinese: 阿根廷能再度贏得美洲盃嗎？

definition: separated in time (usu. followed by a quantity of time)
for a time/at one time/one time/once
to take the lead/to show initiative
to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
whether or not/can it or can't it/is it possible?
